entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, New Tecumseth

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:59 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 07:59 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:59 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
